articles.title: Europe's Wooly Rhino Genes Reconstructed From DNA in Predator Poop - ScienceAlert
articles.description: We may have been overlooking a surprisingly rich source of ancient DNA.
articles.content:
We may have been overlooking a surprisingly rich source of ancient DNA.
Scientists have managed to reconstruct the mitochondrial genome of extinct wooly rhinoceros (Coelodonta antiquitatis) from DNA… [+3256 chars]
